message: I'll give you a fair share, now it's your turn!
Let's split it evenly, a fair deal for both of us.
I'm being generous, but you can do better!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to make it worthwhile. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm still being generous, but you're not getting it all!
This is my final offer. I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I need more to make it worth my while. Let's finish this before things get even worse.
It's time to meet in the middle, Bob!
